text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
May 17, 1957
Mr. Prank Schooley
Station WILL-AM-FM-TV
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Prank:
A note of thanks for your excellent contributions
to the NAEB meetings held in connection with the Institute,
and especially for your help at the Board meetings.
I hope, when I am past president, that my successor will
be as indebted to me for my contributions as I am to youi
Yours sincerely.
Burton Paulu
President
BP :ks
